thread.title: Eagles withdraw four of their five rule change proposals
thread.title_full: Eagles withdraw four of their five rule change proposals

author: Michael David Smith
title: Eagles withdraw four of their five rule change proposals
text:
MichaelEdits says: Mar 25, 2017 5:17 PM 
So they’ve withdrawn the four I agree with and kept the one I hate. That figures. touchdownelvis says: Mar 25, 2017 5:24 PM 
It’s a shame about the alternate helmet proposal. Some of the throwbacks look far, far better with helmets to match, especially where the team logo has changed significantly. ak185 says: Mar 25, 2017 5:39 PM 
Their proposals, minus the helmet rule, were all terrible. And of course, as per usual, the NFL will eliminate an entire element of the game due to “player safety”, which like a catch, has no defined meaning and usually will just result in a penalty. osiris33 (bandwagon since 1976) says: Mar 25, 2017 5:39 PM 
Oh, so let’s take out a super exciting play that leads to more uncertainty in the kicking game because the Seahawks are good at it. See “Rules Changes” every year pastabelly says: Mar 25, 2017 5:45 PM 
Oregon wears different helmets every week. The NFL, which only plays lip service to player safety, is over the top on only allowing one helmet type per team. Mar 25, 2017 6:26 PM 
Eagles withdraw from winning Superbowls also. distracted9 says: Mar 25, 2017 6:58 PM 
Seattle is also responsible for the rampant drug testing.. because they were good at it..them and Dallas. Heck Dallas has one playoff win since they took cocaine out of their locker room. Leave a Reply 
You must be logged in to leave a comment. Not a member? Register now! Search
